entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -17.5°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -17.5°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 41 %

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 11 February 2023
